from target and give to owner Group about level 20

shield 16 in group, 22 solo

>Crushbone Screaming mace Yaulp +10 str and +22
ac for 18 sec's party of 14's - solo 22

>Solsulek A? Obsidian Shard Obsidian shatter ?

+10)damage and root in place Mob is mid to high 30s
